narrative.narrative: Linus Airways was a short lived domestic Indonesian airline based at Jakarta Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. It started in 2008 and ceased April 27th,2009. It served Medan,Semarang,Batam,Pekanbaru,Palembang and Bandung. It used two BAe 146-200's. A reason it ceased is because it no longer had any planes at the end. Its name is short for Lintasan Nusantara which means The Bridge Across the Archipelago.
